alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda; Nye (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 10 at 4:01PM PDT until September 10 at 4:30PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM PDT FOR NYE AND NORTH CENTRAL ESMERALDA COUNTIES... At 401 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 25 miles east of Mina, or 31 miles northeast of Coaldale, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of Nye and north central Esmeralda Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
